Macro Definition Documentation

◆ CY_CTDAC_FAST_CLKCFG_DIV

#define CY_CTDAC_FAST_CLKCFG_DIV   (99uL)

Clock divider integer value for quick clock setup.

Divides PERI clock by 100.
